attacks.name: Loathe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shake It Off
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Colorless Pokémon your opponent has in play.

attacks.name: Flock
attacks.text: Search your deck for Wurmple and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Miraculous Scales
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Twilight Poison
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Wind Shard
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Slight Intrusion
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Wing Buzz
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Afterimage Assault
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Ninjask and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Cursed Rain
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon. Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hopeless Scream
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Me First
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Psy Bolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Peck Off
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grand Loop
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards. You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Find Ice
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Water Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Chilling Sigh
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Tri Edge
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Swallow
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Continuous Tumble
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Energy Bomb
attacks.text: You may move all Energy from this Pokémon to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Raging Thunder
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Random Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Headlock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Voltage Rush
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Future Sight
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Stressful Eye
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Discard a Trainer card you find there.

attacks.name: Bleh
attacks.text: Discard a Special Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

abilities.name: Tool Concealment
abilities.text: Each Pokémon Tool card in play has no effect.

attacks.name: Evolution Jammer
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Pokémon during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Curse Deeply
attacks.text: Put 5 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Close Encounter
attacks.text: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn. Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Swift Lunge
attacks.text: You may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Piercing Prizes
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your remaining Prize cards.

attacks.name: Unwavering Blade
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Stun Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sand Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Midair Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Cursed Eyes
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may move 3 damage counters from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of his or her Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Rip Off
attacks.text: Choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Diminutive Desire
attacks.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Doom Desire
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. The Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out at the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sweet Kiss
attacks.text: Your opponent draws a card.

attacks.name: Go Fetch
attacks.text: Shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

attacks.name: Powerful Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may look at the top 8 cards of your deck. Choose any basic Energy cards you find there and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

abilities.name: Jewel Armor
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Spin Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Look for Keys
attacks.text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Item card. Put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Shed Skin
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Max Wind
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mach Press
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Wrapped in Wind
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Song of Echoes
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Midnight Eyes
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Continuous Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Leer
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Almost Flight
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shatter
attacks.text: Discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Power Howl
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Steam Blast
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fast Raid
attacks.text: If you go first, you can use this attack on your first turn.

attacks.name: Light Pulse
attacks.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sonic Ace
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dragon Strike
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't use Dragon Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Dragon Ascent
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dragon Road
abilities.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, the Retreat Cost of each of your Dragon Pokémon in play is ColorlessColorless less.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Dragon Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Wing
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Stream
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Drill Run
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Feelin' Fine
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Burrow
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Blow Through
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Aerial Ace
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Clear Humming
abilities.text: Each of your Colorless Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Intensifying Burn
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragon Pulse
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

attacks.name: Emerald Break
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the number of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Set Up
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Sky Return
attacks.text: Return this Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Homing Pidove
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your deck. Then, you may shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Fly
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Strong Winds
attacks.text: Shuffle all cards attached to each player's Pokémon into that player's deck.

attacks.name: Feather Dance
attacks.text: During your next turn, each of this Pokémon's attacks does 80 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Sky Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Gallade Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gallade-EX.

name: Healing Scarf
rules: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to the Pokémon this card is attached to, heal 20 damage from it.

name: Latios Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Latios-EX.

name: Mega Turbo
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rayquaza Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Rayquaza-EX.

name: Revive
rules: You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Sky Field
rules: Each player can have 8 Pokémon on his or her Bench.(When this card leaves play, each player discards Benched Pokémon until he or she has 5 Pokémon on the Bench. The owner of this card discards first.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Steven
rules: Search your deck for a Supporter card and a basic Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Trainers' Mail
rules: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Trainer card you find there (except for Trainers' Mail) and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Wally
rules: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-EX) and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Wide Lens
rules: Damage from the attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by Weakness and Resistance for your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Winona
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Colorless Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Double Dragon Energy
rules: This card can only be attached to Dragon Pokémon.This card provides every type of Energy, but provides only 2 Energy at a time, only while this card is attached to a Dragon Pokémon.(If this card is attached to anything other than a Dragon Pokémon, discard this card.)
